title: Classifier API should use generics in getClasses
description: Classifier#getClasses APIs return List<ClassificationResult<BytesRef>> while they should be consistent with the generics used in the other APIs (e.g. assignClass returns ClassificationResult<T>).

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services
